ObrasSociales.title: Health Insurance
ObrasSociales.text: Below we show you the Health Insurance with which we work, you can click to go to their corresponding page.
ObrasSociales.text-2: We also provide you with some branches of each Health Insurance along with their schedules.

turnos.title: Online Shift Scheduling
turnos.text: Here you can make appointments with affiliated social works
turnos.formtext: Enter your details for the shift
turnos.name: Name
turnos.succes: Your appointment was successfully booked, they will contact you soon

maps.title: Nearby Hospitals
maps.text: Here you can find all the hospitals in CABA
maps.text-2: Would you like to center the map on your location?
